channel.title: CVE Feed for Samsung Mobile -- Samsung Pass
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Samsung Mobile -- Samsung Pass

item.title: CVE-2023-30676|2024-08-02T14:28:52.186Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsung%20pass
item.description: Improper access control vulnerability in Samsung Pass prior to version 4.2.03.1 allows physical attackers to access data of Samsung Pass.

item.title: CVE-2023-30675|2024-08-02T14:28:51.952Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsung%20pass
item.description: Improper authentication in Samsung Pass prior to version 4.2.03.1 allows local attacker to access stored account information when Samsung Wallet is not installed.

item.title: CVE-2023-42575|2024-08-02T19:23:40.153Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsung%20pass
item.description: Improper Authentication vulnerability in Samsung Pass prior to version 4.3.00.17 allows physical attackers to bypass authentication due to invalid flag setting.

item.title: CVE-2023-42576|2024-08-02T19:23:40.218Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsung%20pass
item.description: Improper Authentication vulnerability in Samsung Pass prior to version 4.3.00.17 allows physical attackers to bypass authentication due to invalid exception handler.

item.title: CVE-2023-30677|2024-08-02T14:28:51.938Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsung%20pass
item.description: Improper access control vulnerability in Samsung Pass prior to version 4.2.03.1 allows physical attackers to access data of Samsung Pass on a certain state of an unlocked device.

item.title: CVE-2023-42554|2024-08-02T19:23:39.784Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsung%20pass
item.description: Improper Authentication vulnerabiity in Samsung Pass prior to version 4.3.00.17 allows physical attackers to bypass authentication.
